title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a java editor is open and the user right clicks on the left vertical ruler, a menu should open. However, the menu does not appear.
EB: When a java editor is open and the user right clicks on the left vertical ruler, a menu should popup with options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
